      • startHeartbeating

        public void startHeartbeating(int id)
        Starts an "heartbeat" where every period of time, to remind the server that it is still connected. If heartbeat stops arriving to the server, the server will consider this client disconnected
        Parameters:
        id -

      • handleDisconnection

        public void handleDisconnection()
        Handle disconnection is invoked by the serverImplementationSocket or by the catch of a remoteException. It stops the heartbeat and set server interface to null

      • reconnect

        protected java.lang.Boolean reconnect(int id,
                                      int connectionType)
        When the player tries to reconnect, it does the same as in main of client but it calls serverInterface.reconnect() instead of serverInterface.register(). This way the server checks if the room is still going and in that case, it puts the player back in the game
        Parameters:
        id - player trying to reconnect
        connectionType - player connection
        Returns:
        false if the reconnect fails, true otherwise

      • initNewExecutor

        protected void initNewExecutor()
        Starts heartbeating
